main event: Several UFO sightings were reported in Hawaii from August 2 to August 5, 1965, including bright lights and an object falling from the sky.
interesting points: A family in Waikiki observed bright lights changing colors from red to blue at high altitudes on August 2., On August 4, many observers reported a bright object falling from the sky southwest of Oahu, illuminating the entire sky., The object broke into three pieces before burning out according to investigators., Observation of a high altitude, high speed UFO was made by a TAC C-130 crew on August 4 that illuminated the sky., A bright light was reported on August 5 but was ruled non-significant with no further investigation.
sighted object: bright lights and a falling object
